title: Inclusion-Based Instructional Design to Improve Access to Educational Resources for Refugee Households

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Capacity-building program for science sector managers to develop strategies for improving educational accessibility for refugee families

learning_goals: Three resource-mapping strategies utilizing cultural capital can be proposed for designing an inclusive learning environment.
Guidelines for developing mobile-only accessible microlearning content can be formulated in at least two ways.
At least one educational resource linkage plan can be proposed to strengthen the social networks of refugee families.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
